entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog at times late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog at times in the morning. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Thursday 6 April 2023
